nogambauru (prakata) pirisa - uththanacha parisa me sasunehi pawidiwa sitina wikshiptha sith atha, uswa nangunumanaya athi , chapala ,raluwadan athi, pralapa pawasana, mulawu sihi athi, samyak pragnyawa nathi enisama samadhigatha sithak nathi ekanga wu sith nathi bhrantha sith athi, sanwara nokala nisa prakruthi induran athi bhikshuhu prakata nogambauru pirisa wethi.
